content:
cilium-bugtool completion 
 Generate the autocompletion script for the specified shell 
 Synopsis 
 Generate the autocompletion script for cilium-bugtool for the specified shell.
See each sub-command's help for details on how to use the generated script. 
 Options 
   -h, --help   help for completion
 
 SEE ALSO 
 
 cilium-bugtool 	 - Collects agent & system information useful for bug reporting 
 cilium-bugtool completion bash 	 - Generate the autocompletion script for bash 
 cilium-bugtool completion fish 	 - Generate the autocompletion script for fish 
 cilium-bugtool completion powershell 	 - Generate the autocompletion script for powershell 
 cilium-bugtool completion zsh 	 - Generate the autocompletion script for zsh
